channel.title: Looking for a good [PI] source + client
channel.description:
Okay so I used to use some bad [PI] S&C. I've used HybridPvP, TrisidiaX, DeathlyPvP, and the list goes on! I'm looking for a good source and client that either
1. Looks like the Near-Reality revision 2. Is a good [PI] base without all the bugs ect..

item.title: Looking for a good [PI] source + client
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

Dylan012:

No, I don’t. Can you help me to remove it?

just literally remove the line of the string lol

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a good [PI] source + client
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Dylan012:

It isn’t a problem, it is just showing the id of the button you clicked at. So it is just a message you should ignore. If you want to disable it, i can’t help you further cause i don’t know how to disable it. But i got that messages of the ids too so its not a bug or something.

Really? You don’t know how to comment out or remove a string?

Read full topic
